posts.post_content:
A.G. Spalding & said to be Cap Anson I believe, player in Chicago uniform, on the front.  

Looks to be blank backed, even though on the front there is a little icon on the lower right that says "members of the Chicago Baseball Team".   So bit of a mystery why this is blank backed.  
I held it up to the light and no players show through.   

A one-off?  A prototype? A very neat & rare item none-the-less.

Video on YouTube on these:

[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aSz_fGxKwnM[/url]


$700 or best offer shipped (Check or Paypal F&F preferred)
